channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 19th January
item.description:

item.title: 51.547469,-0.186806, 19th January
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8637727 This issue was reported by someone else 2 weeks ago with the reference number above. Your response says “ This is TFL aparatus and has been reported to them.” - could you check the 3 pictures I attached here and confirm it is TFL please? It is not fixed yet (18 Jaanuary) Is there any chance that it belongs perhaps to Landsec?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge amount of rubbish in front garden, 18th January
item.description:
Reporting again as issue still exists. Huge amount of litter in front garden of 19 glasbrook road. Has been this way for at least 6 months. Very depressing to see.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Glasbrook Road, Eltham

item.title: New Squire padlock required for vehicle gates, 18th January
item.description:
The old squire padlock has broken - the barrel just keep turning and won’t unlock. Galliard Homes have put a temporary replacement padlock on the chain for security, but we need a replacement Squire padlock so that we can get our cuttings removed and bins emptied. Many thanks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Avenue, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
